title: Number of BOTs in 3s are too damn high
body: Way too many bots, it's destroying the game. They won't let you surrender and they just keep feeding. Please fix this!

replies.body:
Two matches in a row, all five players were bots except myself.

Riot could do something. Clearly, they don't want to. Banning bots in waves a couple of times per year is meaningless, leaving the sociopaths farming bots free to level them up for months at a time.

I suppose if I hadn't stopped playing TTL a year or two ago, my elo might hide this problem.

But the fact is that Riot is complicit in it, one way or another.

Well the reason they do ban waves is because theyre tracking the creators and seeking legal action. Im no lawyer, but I imagine they want insurmountable proof that someone is breaking the law before they sue them. So they track em, and shut down entire operations at a time, instead of one measley account at a time. Just try to think of it realistically... one company against thousands of botters, creating thousands of accounts. Its impossible to keep up.
